    Importer des données

    Add patients to a subset

    add_persons_to_subset.Rd

    Add patients to a subset

    Usage

    add_persons_to_subset(
  output,
  r = shiny::reactiveValues(),
  m = shiny::reactiveValues(),
  persons = tibble::tibble(),
  subset_id = integer(),
  i18n = character(),
  ns = character()
)

    Arguments

    output

    Shiny output variable

    r

    A shiny::reactiveValues object, used to communicate between modules

    m

    A shiny::reactiveValues object, used to communicate between modules

    persons

    data variable containing patients / persons (data.frame / tibble)

    subset_id

    ID of the subset (integer)

    i18n

    Translator object from shiny.i18n library

    ns

    Shiny namespace

    Examples

    if (FALSE) {
persons <- tibble::tribble(~person_id, 123L, 456L, 789L)
subset_add_patients(output = output, r = r, m = m, persons = persons, subset_id = 3, i18n = i18n, ns = ns)
}
